column6: With all the prison gangs against him, Matt Murdock turns to unlikely allies in his quest for the truth. And as Kingpin returns to Gen-Pop, Ryker's Island teeters on the edge of an explosion, and Matt can either give it a push, or remember the man he used to be. Meanwhile, Ben Urich and Dakota North hunt whoever is running around Hell's Kitchen pretending to be Daredevil!
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | colorist:Frank D'Armata | penciller (cover):Tommy Lee Edwards | inker:Stefano Gaudiano | penciller:Michael Lark | letterer:Cory Petit
